pageTitle: Public events for December 16, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 16, 2015:

Ottawa

9:00 a.m. – The Prime Minister attends a meeting with National Aboriginal Organizations.

Centre Block, Aboriginal Room
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation

Ottawa

11:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister holds a media availability after meeting with National Aboriginal Organizations.

Foyer of the House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation

Ottawa

2:00 p.m. – The Prime Minister attends the Maclean’s Town Hall hosted by Paul Wells.

National Arts Centre, 4th stage
53 Elgin Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should contact Maclean’s for accreditation.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
